devdoc.details: The market orders is stored in structured red-black trees and doubly linked lists in each node.

acceptedContracts().details: The contact name listed in this method is also needed to be listed `requiredContracts` method.

cleanOrders(address).details: The order list per user is not updated in real-time when an order is filled. This function removes the filled order from that order list per user to reduce gas costs for calculating if the collateral is enough or not.

params._amount: Amount of funds the maker wants to borrow/lend
params._side: Order position type, Borrow or Lend
params._unitPrice: Amount of unit price taker wish to borrow/lend

params._limit: Max limit to get unit prices

returns.unitPrices: The array of borrow unit prices

returns._0: The highest borrow price per future value

params._limit: Max limit to get unit prices

returns.unitPrices: The array of lending unit prices

returns._0: The lowest lend price per future value
The mid price per future value

returns.maturity: The maturity of the selected order
returns.side: Order position type, Borrow or Lend
returns.timestamp: Timestamp when the order was created

returns.activeAmount: The total amount of active order on the order book
returns.inactiveAmount: The total amount of inactive orders filled on the order book
returns.inactiveFutureValue: The total future value amount of inactive orders filled on the order book
returns.maturity: The maturity of market that orders were placed.

returns.activeAmount: The total amount of active order on the order book
returns.inactiveAmount: The total amount of inactive orders filled on the order book
returns.inactiveFutureValue: The total future value amount of inactive orders filled on the order book
returns.maturity: The maturity of market that orders were placed.

initialize(address,bytes32,uint256,uint2.details: Function is invoked by the proxy contract when the contract is added to the ProxyController.

params._ccy: The main currency for the order book
params._genesisDate: The initial date when the first market open
params._maturity: The initial maturity of the market
params._resolver: The address of the Address Resolver contract

returns._0: The boolean if the market is matured or not
The boolean if the market is opened or not

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

requiredContracts().details: The contract name list is in `./libraries/Contracts.sol`.

acceptedContracts().notice: Returns contract names that can call this contract.

cleanOrders(address).notice: Cleans own orders to remove order ids that are already filled on the order book.

createOrder(uint8,address,uint256,uint25.notice: Creates the order. Takes the order if the order is matched, and places new order if not match it.

getActiveBorrowOrderIds(address).notice: Gets the order ids of active borrowing order on the order book

getActiveLendOrderIds(address).notice: Gets the order ids of active lending order on the order book

getBorrowOrderBook(uint256).notice: Gets the order book of borrow.

getBorrowUnitPrice().notice: Gets the highest borrow price per future value.

getLendOrderBook(uint256).notice: Gets the order book of lend.

getLendUnitPrice().notice: Gets the lowest lend price per future value.

getMidUnitPrice().notice: Gets the mid price per future value.

getOrder(uint48).notice: Gets the market order from the order book.

getTotalAmountFromBorrowOrders(address).notice: Calculates and gets the active and inactive amounts from the user orders of borrowing deals.

getTotalAmountFromLendOrders(address).notice: Calculates and gets the active and inactive amounts from the user orders of lending deals.

isMatured().notice: Gets if the market is matured.

isOpened().notice: Gets if the market is opened.

requiredContracts().notice: Returns the contract names used in this contract.

userdoc.notice: Implements the module that allows lending market participants to create/cancel market orders, and also provides a future value calculation module. For updates, this contract is basically called from `LendingMarketController.sol`instead of being called \ directly by the user.
